extensionDescription.message: Allows for live manipulation of HTML tables.

optionsLabelHighlightColor.message: Highlighing Color (Values either Hex, RGB or Firefox Colors)
optionsLabelHighlightColor.description: Options: input description for highlighting color.

optionsDefaultHighlightColor.description: Options: default value of highlighting color.

optionsLabelIgnoreHTML.message: Ignore HTML within cell when comparing (e.g. delete and sort)?
optionsLabelIgnoreHTML.description: Optionen: input description for ignore HTML.

optionsLabelTabTableDisplay.message: Design of tables opened in new tab
optionsLabelTabTableDisplay.description: Options: input description for table display in new tab.

optionsLabelTabTableDisplay-0.description: Options: input description for table display in new tab; version 1.

optionsLabelTabTableDisplay-1.description: Options: input description for table display in new tab; version 2.

optionsLabelTabTableDisplay-2.description: Options: input description for table display in new tab; version 3.

dropdownMarkFieldsExact.message: Mark fields with exactly this text

dropdownMarkFieldsInclude.message: Mark fields that include this text

dropdownColDelByFieldExact.message: Delete columns with this field (exact match)
dropdownColDelByFieldExact.description: Dropdown text delete rows by field (exact match).

dropdownColDelByFieldInclude.message: Delete columns with this field (partial match)
dropdownColDelByFieldInclude.description: Dropdown text delete rows by field (including).

dropdownRowDelByFieldExact.message: Delete rows with this field (exact match)
dropdownRowDelByFieldExact.description: Dropdown text delete rows by field (exact match).

dropdownRowDelByFieldInclude.message: Delete rows with this field (partial match)
dropdownRowDelByFieldInclude.description: Dropdown text delete rows by field (including).

dropdownSortByColumnsASC.description: Dropdown text sort table columns ascending.

dropdownSortByColumnsDESC.description: Dropdown text sort table columns descending.

dropdownSortByRowsASC.description: Dropdown text sort table rows ascending.

dropdownSortByRowsDESC.description: Dropdown text sort table rows descending.

errorNoCellFound.message: No table cell has been targeted, please click on a table cell and try again!
errorNoCellFound.description: Error message: no table cell clicked.

errorNoTableFound.message: No table has been targeted, please click on a table and try again!

errorNoTableGiven.message: No table has been given or selected. This is an internal error and cannot be fixed.

errorCantSortRowspan.message: Unable to sort by table row. Some cells stretch across multiple rows.
errorCantSortRowspan.description: Error message: Can't sort becaus of rowspan.

errorCantSortColspan.message: Unable to sort by table columns. Some cells stretch across multiple columns.
errorCantSortColspan.description: Error message: Can't sort becaus of colspan.

errorOptionsInvalid.message: Unable to save settings. Please check if your input data is correct!
errorOptionsInvalid.description: Error message: Settings not saved because of invalid values.
